name: The 2D Adventures of Rotating Octopus Character
name_original: The 2D Adventures of Rotating Octopus Character
description:
The 2D Adventures of Rotating Octopus Character is a platform game with a twist (a lot of twisting!). Stick to every surface and leap from wall to wall as you grab baby octopi and avoid evil hats, flying knives, exploding wasabi and a host of other meanies intent on Octopus Doom.
Purchase or use of this item is subject to the PlayStation®Network Terms of Service and User Agreement. If you do not wish to accept all these terms, do not purchase or use this item. One-time license fee for downloads to up to 2 console systems and 2 portable systems that are associated with the purchasing account.
